㗎咋
【㗎咋】gaa3 zaa3 / zaa4〔jià ză〕<br/>(modal particle) just, only, that's all
</>
㗎啦
【㗎啦】gaa3 laa1〔jià la〕<br/>modal particle used to assert a fact (to imply that there are no alternatives)
</>
㗎啦
【㗎啦】gaa3 laa3〔jià la〕<br/>modal particle used as a reminder or when giving advice
</>
㗎啦
【㗎啦】gaa3 laa4〔jià la〕<br/>modal particle to express a slight surprise to something (or with a questioning tone)
</>

一個骨
【一個骨（一个骨）】jat1 go3 gwat1〔yī ge gŭ〕<br/>15 minutes; quarter-hour; literal meaning: a piece of bone; Cantonese slang, derived from the English word 'quarter', the pronunciation of 'quart' sounds similar to the Cantonese pronunciation of '骨' (gwat1)

世界仔
【世界仔】sai3 gaai3 zai2〔shì jiè zĭ〕<br/>(noun) a guy who is skillful and good at socializing; a man of the world, usually pejorative.

今時唔同往日
【今時唔同往日（今时唔同往日）】gam1 si4 m4 tung4 wong5 jat6〔jīn shí ń tóng wăng rì〕<br/>how it is nowadays is not the same as how it used to be; the situation is different
</>

啋過你
【啋過你（啋过你）】coi1 gwo3 nei5〔cāi guò nĭ〕<br/>a slang to say: "There is no way your negative prediction (normally) will happen, touch wood"; an exclamation to something inappropriate or negative
</>
啋過你把口

</>

【啋過你把衰口（啋过你把衰口）】coi1 gwo3 nei5 baa2 seoi1 hau2〔cāi guò nĭ bă shuāi kŏu〕<br/>shut your bad mouth, which is an interjection to react against something bad that was spoken by another person
</>

</>

【風水佬呃你十年八年，唔呃得一世（风水佬呃你十年八年，唔呃得一世）】fung1 seoi2 lou2 ak1 nei5 sap6 nin4 baat3 nin4, m4 ak1 dak1 jat1 sai3〔fēng shui lăo è nĭ shí nián bā nián, ḿ è de yī shì〕<br/>literally: 'a Fung Shui master can fool you for only eight to ten years, but not for a whole life'; time will tell; you will realise with time that I am telling you the truth; time will witness the truth; would I lie to you?

【飛（飞）】fei1〔fēi〕<br/>(verb) (of relationship) 1. to break up (with a boy /girl friend); or being dumped (by a boy/girl friend); (of hair) 1. cut; (slang)  ticket; (slang) to kick someone off from (a show, etc.)
</>

【食屎屙飯（食屎屙饭）】sik6 si2 o1 faan6〔shí shĭ ē fàn〕<br/>(literally: to eat shit and excrete rice); an expression to insult someone who does things in an unconventional or abnormal manner which does not make sense or someone that does not stands to reasoning

</>

鳥取縣
【鳥取縣（鸟取县）】niu5 ceoi2 jyun6〔niăo qŭ xiàn〕<br/>Tottori Prefecture, a prefecture of Japan
</>
鳩
【鳩（鸠）】gau1〔jiū〕<br/>penis (Cantonese - used in degoratory terms)
</>
鳩嗚
【鳩嗚（鸠呜）】gau1 wu1〔jiū wū〕<br/>homophonic transliteration of "gou wu"(shopping) in mandarin
</>
鳩屎
【鳩屎（鸠屎）】gau1 si2〔jiū shĭ〕<br/>an expression used to curse someone who is arrogant and thinks he / she is the best
</>
鳳
【鳳（凤）】fung6〔fèng〕<br/>(noun) 1. Chicken; 2. Hooker
</>
鳳凰
【鳳凰（凤凰）】fung6 wong4〔fèng huáng〕<br/>a female with status or power (slang)
</>

【鳳凰山（凤凰山）】fung6 wong4 saan1〔fèng huáng shān〕<br/>Lantau Peak, highest peak of Lantau Island in Hong Kong
</>
